name: Are You Sure You Want To Send That?
name_original: Are You Sure You Want To Send That?
description:
Want to learn typing and how to be a worthwhile human being at the same time?  Well now you can.  A modern day typing tutor with procedurally generated tweets that you need to erase before the phone's power goes out!

Made for Ludum Dare 39 (07/28/2017 - 07/31/2017).  All art, programming, music, and sound effects (minus the disk drive sound at the beginning and our logo graphic/sound) done by us during the jam.

Art and idea: Corinne Groble

Programming, Music, Sound, Voice: Brian Peters

For PC and HTML5 In-Browser

SPOILERS AHEAD:

If you want to cheat and skip ahead a screen, hold down Shift and press PgUp.
